channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The Midwest could offer fall’s most electric foliage but leaf peepers elsewhere won’t miss out
item.description: Fall is back, and bringing with it jack-o’-lanterns, football, pumpkin spice everything and, in some parts of the country, especially vibrant foliage.

item.title: AI is helping shape the 2024 presidential race. But not in the way experts feared
item.description: Generative artificial intelligence is playing a major role in the presidential campaign, even if the greatest fears about how it could threaten the U.S. presidential election haven’t materialized yet.

item.title: California governor signs law to protect children from social media addiction
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom has signed a law making it illegal for social media platforms to knowingly provide addictive feeds to children without parental consent.
